s1.message: Added ChinaList as recommended filter subscription.

s2.message: Fixed: Very bad performance on some webpages.

s3.message: Made sure that collapsing of blocked elements works reliably again and that Image Toolbar extension doesn't disable this feature (bug 21278)

s4.message: Made Adblock Plus initialization more bulletproof, it can no longer be disrupted by other extensions like FoxyProxy or Sxipper (forum topic).

s5.message: Worked around a bug in .NET Framework Assistant causing Adblock Plus user interface to break (forum topic).

s6.message: Fixed: "Apply" button doesn't enable in Preferences if a filter subscription is moved with the mouse (bug 21337).

s7.message: Fixed: List of blockable items occasionally misses out some items if it is open while page is loading.

s8.message: Fixed: Error shows up in Error Console if Adblock Plus needs to process certain types of addresses (forum topic).

s10.message: The extension Custom Buttons 0.0.4.3 malfunctions if Adblock Plus is installed. This is due to wrong assumptions in Custom Buttons (bug 21391).
